properties.name: MinImpactVelocity
properties.comment: If we have at least this velocity (in Z) when entering the volume, we will post the specified event

properties.name: ImpactEvent
properties.comment: Event to post if the pawn has the specified velocity

methods.name: OnCameraEnteredWater
methods.comment: Called whenever the camera entered water

methods.name: OnCameraExitedWater
methods.comment: Called whenever the camera entered water

methods.name: OnPawnHitSurface
methods.comment: Called whenever a pawn hits the surface of the water volume

methods.name: GetImpactEvent
methods.comment: Get the impact event that a pawn should post when it hits the water surface

properties.name: mImpactAudioMap
properties.comment: Audio effects to play whenever a pawn hits the water surface with a specified velocity
